DarkMouse::

She stood there in utter amazement.  That ship seemed to just appear 
out of no where. "What in the matrix?" she said in a hushed voice as 
her optics stared wide at the sight. She saw him motion to her.  She 
closed her mouth, which had been hangihng open from astonishment. She 
straightened up and walked confidently past Galvatron and into the 
ship. As she passed him,"Nice trick. I like how you shield the ship 
like that." in a calm manor. She looked around,"Nice, nice. Not 
thrilling, but nice." she said with a slight smile. "So where the 
mess hall there pal. You did mention a small snack earlier didn't 
you? So then, lead the way." she said, trying to act all unimpressed 
and all. But she really was impressed with the techonological 
advances that had been made. She was dying to see how this ship 
worked. She was a computer wiz and rather a genious about such 
things. After all, she had built Megatron an entire fortress once. 
Complete with a heavy defence system and everything. She looked at 
Galvatron. "Well?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
